description:
Bruce is a big, beefy straight boy!

He's 26 years old, 6'1" tall, and he weighs 215 pounds. He says he can bench press a whopping 365 pounds!

He played fullback on his high school and college football teams. And you just know he's the kind of guy who fucked the lead cheerleader on prom night (which he says he did)!

He's not dating the cheerleader anymore, but has instead opted for a kinkier girlfriend. They like to bring in thirds, and Bruce's favorite thing is to watch another guy fuck his girlfriend!
title: Bruce
